resources.string:
Hi, My name is Andrew M. 
 
I love playing video games. 
A game I have been playing a lot lately is 
Animal Crossing: New Horizons. 
 
It's a unique, cute, and friendly life simulation game, where the main focus is to spend time building a small island community, surrounded and accompanied by various animal friends who are always friendly and willing to lend a hand or play games with you.
